content: *all my designs are free to download if you enjoy them please consider making a donation to your local humane society or animal care organization * groovy dk is an asymmetric triangle shaped shawl/scarf with deep ribs and notches on one side you will need 4mm needles and dk weight yarns if you prefer a thicker shawl use 5mm needles and aran weight yarns you will need a minimum of 500 meters of yarn for a large scarf and closer to 900 meters for a large shawl using more yarn will result in a deeper larger shawl this design is quite flexible if you prefer to knit groovy with lace or fingering weight please see * groovy lace or fingering weight 1 * questo scialle asimmetrico e lavorato a maglia rasata e a rasato rovescio si inizia ad un angolo e si continua a lavorare fino a che il filato non e terminato oppure fino a che non si raggiunge la grandezza desiderata avrete bisogno di ferri 4 00mm e minimo 500 metri di filato dk gli scialli della foto sono lavorati con i ferri 4 00 mm con poco meno di 550 metri di filato dk buon divertimento traduzione di marina 2 per unfilodi 3 enjoy pattern information number of pages 2 language s english italian instructions written sizes variable schematic 1 photos 2 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/groovy-lace-or-sock-weight 2 http //www ravelry com/people/bricci 3 http //unfilodi com/
